message.content:
cs.DC, cs.PF, cs.SE, cs.SY, cs.CE 

The paper discusses a monitoring system for HPC installations, which involves data collection and analysis from various levels such as facilities, systems, runtimes, and applications. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC), Performance (cs.PF), Software Engineering (cs.SE), Systems and Control (cs.SY), and Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science (cs.CE). Among these, cs.DC is the most likely category as the paper focuses on a distributed monitoring system for HPC installations. The other categories are also relevant as they involve aspects such as performance optimization, software engineering, and energy management, which are discussed in the paper.
